department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Row Plot Seeder and its accessories including training
description: Purchase of one (1) new Row Plot Seeder and ancillary items including training in accordance with the Purchase Description at Annex "A" and as described at Annex "B" - Pricing
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: Row Plot Seeder

**Tender Reference:** WS3717016894
**Solicitation Reference:** WS3717016894
**Publication Date:** May 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2023, 02:00 PM EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

**Trade Agreements:**
The RFP is subject to the following trade agreements:
	* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Contract Value:** Not disclosed

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Delivery:** The Row Plot Seeder and ancillary items are to be delivered to the end-user entity, Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Contact Information:**
Veronique Beaudry (SPAC/PSPC)
veronique.beaudry2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16235540?extsite=MTYyMzU1NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments:** None

## Tender Description:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the purchase of a new Row Plot Seeder and ancillary items, including training. The procurement is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Purchase Description at Annex “A” and Pricing at Annex “B”.

## Key Facts:
* Tender Reference: WS3717016894
* Solicitation Reference: WS3717016894
* Tender Closing Date: June 20, 2023, 02:00 PM EST
* Delivery Location: Ottawa, Ontario
* Trade Agreements: CKFTA, CCFTA, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, CFTA, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
